name: Arch Mage
description: Can cast powerful spells that can deal massive damage to enemies or heal allies.

name: Genie
description: Can summon other creatures to join the battle and assist allies.

name: Giant
description: Has a chance to stun enemies with each attack, leaving them unable to act for a short time.

name: Gremlin
description: Can disable an enemy's magic or ranged attack for a short time by sabotaging their weapon or spellcasting ability.

name: Iron Golem
description: Takes reduced damage from physical attacks and is immune to certain types of damage.

name: Mage
description: Can cast a variety of spells to control the battlefield, such as summoning barriers or slowing enemy movements.

name: Master Genie
description: Can cast powerful spells that can deal massive damage to enemies or heal allies, and can also summon other creatures to join the battle.

name: Master Gremlin
description: Can disable an enemy's magic or ranged attack for a short time by sabotaging their weapon or spellcasting ability, and can also heal allies.

name: Naga
description: Can immobilize enemies with their poisonous attacks, leaving them stuck in place and unable to act for a short time.

name: Naga Queen
description: Can immobilize enemies with their poisonous attacks, and can also summon other creatures to join the battle and assist allies.

name: Obsidian Gargoyle
description: Can turn to stone and gain immunity to all types of damage for a short time, during which it cannot move or attack.

name: Stone Gargoyle
description: Can turn to stone and gain immunity to most types of damage for a short time, during which it cannot move or attack.

name: Stone Golem
description: Takes reduced damage from physical attacks and is immune to certain types of damage, and can also heal allies.

name: Titan
description: Can cast powerful spells that can deal massive damage to enemies or heal allies, and can also create earthquakes that damage all enemies on the battlefield.
